channel.title: LegendScape Employment (Payment Positions)
channel.description:
LegendScape is once again looking for staff. If you want to be paid for your work you [u][b]must[/b][/u] be able to work at the office in person. Player Moderator positions are available for those who help out people in the server.
We are currently looking for people in both positions office and server. [hr] [list][b]Office Requirments:[/b]
[ul][li]Must be able to work in the offices.[/li] [li]Must have a high level education.[/li] [li]Must have knowledge in mmorpg's.[/li] [li]Must be on time.[/li] [li]Must provide all contact information as asked.[/li] [li]Must have msn messenger*[/li][/ul]
[list][b]Must have knowledge in the following fields:[/b]
[ul][li]Java.[/li] [li]Computer Structures.[/li] [li]HTML.[/li] [li]PHP.[/li][/ul]
[hr]
Player Moderators do not need to be office workers although in 1 case so far there is.
[list][b]Player Moderator Requirements:[/b]
[ul][li]Knowledge of the Server.[/li] [li]"LAG" Education.[/li] [li]Must be able to be on when called.[/li] [li]Must have msn messenger[/li][/ul]
[hr]
Technical Moderators
Technical Moderators are very high corporate staff members who work the technical field, these are the guys/girls who keep everything running. This is a Office Job/non-office job. These staff members have [b]silver crowns outlined in green[/b] and optional crowns on the server.
[list][b]Technical Moderator Requirements:[/b]
[ul][li]Must be on call at business hours.[/li] [li]Must have a high educational level.[/li] [li]Must have knowledge of Private servers.[/li] [li]Must have played RuneScape.[/li] [li]Must know the server inside and out.[/li][/ul]
[list][b]Knowledge Required:[/b]
[ul][li]JAVA.[/li] [li]PHP.[/li] [li]HTML.[/li] [li]DOS 1-4.[/li] [li]PERL.[/li][/ul]
[hr]
Online Moderator
Online Moderators have a very important job. It's their job to run [i]damage control*[/i] and keep everyone informed. They are the ones who will go to forums and tell others about our server/company. This is often an Office Job but it doesn't have to be. This job has pay potential with high chance of bounuses even if you are not working in the office!
[list][b]Online Moderator Requirements:[/b]
[ul][li][b]Must have MSN Messenger[/b].[/li] [li]Must have alot of energy and will.[/li] [li]Must have good ISP.[/li] [li]Must be online alot.[/li] [li]Must know the server very well.[/li] [li]Credit Card/bank account (For recieving payments)*[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[center]If you are interested in any of these positions feel free to contact me
[list][b]Contact Information:[/b]
[ul][li]jarrett25@msn.com <--This one is used the most.[/li] [li]jarrett.wilson@legendscape.net[/li][/ul] [/center]

item.title: LegendScape Employment (Payment Positions)
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

LegendScape is once again looking for staff. If you want to be paid for your work you must be able to work at the office in person. Player Moderator positions are available for those who help out people in the server.

We are currently looking for people in both positions office and server.
[hr]
[list]Office Requirments:

[ul][li]Must be able to work in the offices.[/li]
[li]Must have a high level education.[/li]
[li]Must have knowledge in mmorpg’s.[/li]
[li]Must be on time.[/li]
[li]Must provide all contact information as asked.[/li]
[li]Must have msn messenger*[/li][/ul]

[list]Must have knowledge in the following fields:

[ul][li]Java.[/li]
[li]Computer Structures.[/li]
[li]HTML.[/li]
[li]PHP.[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Player Moderators do not need to be office workers although in 1 case so far there is.

[list]Player Moderator Requirements:

[ul][li]Knowledge of the Server.[/li]
[li]“LAG” Education.[/li]
[li]Must be able to be on when called.[/li]
[li]Must have msn messenger[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Technical Moderators

Technical Moderators are very high corporate staff members who work the technical field, these are the guys/girls who keep everything running. This is a Office Job/non-office job. These staff members have silver crowns outlined in green and optional crowns on the server.

[list]Technical Moderator Requirements:

[ul][li]Must be on call at business hours.[/li]
[li]Must have a high educational level.[/li]
[li]Must have knowledge of Private servers.[/li]
[li]Must have played RuneScape.[/li]
[li]Must know the server inside and out.[/li][/ul]

[list]Knowledge Required:

[ul][li]JAVA.[/li]
[li]PHP.[/li]
[li]HTML.[/li]
[li]DOS 1-4.[/li]
[li]PERL.[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Online Moderator

Online Moderators have a very important job. It’s their job to run damage control* and keep everyone informed. They are the ones who will go to forums and tell others about our server/company. This is often an Office Job but it doesn’t have to be. This job has pay potential with high chance of bounuses even if you are not working in the office!

[list]Online Moderator Requirements:

[ul][li]Must have MSN Messenger.[/li]
[li]Must have alot of energy and will.[/li]
[li]Must have good ISP.[/li]
[li]Must be online alot.[/li]
[li]Must know the server very well.[/li]
[li]Credit Card/bank account (For recieving payments)*[/li][/ul]

[hr]

[center]If you are interested in any of these positions feel free to contact me

[list]Contact Information:

[ul][li]jarrett25@msn.com <–This one is used the most.[/li]
[li]jarrett.wilson@legendscape.net[/li][/ul]
[/center]
